subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|又|t1=hand|中|t2=flag or hunting weapon|ls=ic}} – flag or hunting weapon in hand > to perform one's job. Compare {{zh-l|*史}}, {{zh-l|*吏}}.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Exopassive of {{och-l|士|to give or carry out an assignment; to serve}}, literally “what has been assigned” ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
